min-max normalization

Source: R/base.R
normalization.Rd

min-max normalization

Usage

normalization(x, z = 0.2)

Arguments

x

numeric vector

z

scalar add minimum value to avoid 0

Value

normalized vector

Examples

normalization(runif(100,min = -100, max = 100))
#>   [1] 0.3694624 0.8231844 0.8727838 0.4457780 0.4191764 0.3804534 1.0693873
